Package org.ldaptive.io

Class Dsmlv1Reader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.io.Dsmlv1Reader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchResultReader
    public class Dsmlv1Reader
extends Object
implements SearchResultReader
    Reads DSML version 1 from a Reader and returns a SearchResult.
